name: Thai Fried Bananas Recipe (Authentic Kluay Kaek)
description: These Thai fried bananas are so good and so incredibly crisp, you'll want to have them any time of the day.

itemListElement.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine rice flour, tempura flour, shredded coconut, sugar, and sesame seeds. Create an opening in the middle, and slowly add ice-cold water while whisking to blend. Follow this up by adding in coconut milk and whisking.
itemListElement.name: In a large mixing bowl, combine rice flour, tempura flour, shredded coconut, sugar, and sesame seeds. Create an opening in the middle, and slowly add ice-cold water while whisking to blend. Follow this up by adding in coconut milk and whisking.

itemListElement.text: Cut the bananas into 3 thin slices each. Submerge all your banana slices into the prepared batter.
itemListElement.name: Cut the bananas into 3 thin slices each. Submerge all your banana slices into the prepared batter.

itemListElement.text: Place a large wok or deep-frying pan filled with oil over medium-low heat. If you have them, you can add fresh pandan for extra aroma, totally optional.
itemListElement.name: Place a large wok or deep-frying pan filled with oil over medium-low heat. If you have them, you can add fresh pandan for extra aroma, totally optional.

itemListElement.text: Use kitchen tongs to dip the banana slices into the batter, making sure they're well-coated.
itemListElement.name: Use kitchen tongs to dip the banana slices into the batter, making sure they're well-coated.

itemListElement.text: Deep-fry the bananas, making sure not to overcrowd the pan, or you'll end up with a sticky mess. Flip regularly for even frying.
itemListElement.name: Deep-fry the bananas, making sure not to overcrowd the pan, or you'll end up with a sticky mess. Flip regularly for even frying.

itemListElement.text: Fry until golden-brown and crisp. Take them out and let them drain on a sieve or paper towel to get rid of excess oil.
itemListElement.name: Fry until golden-brown and crisp. Take them out and let them drain on a sieve or paper towel to get rid of excess oil.

keywords: fried banana, kluay kaek, thai fried bananas
